attributes.additional_details:
Last year, people studying for a Primary PGCE received a £4000 bursary. Next Year people studying for a Primary PGCE will receive a £4000 bursary. People studying this year will receive £0.

The course requires a high level of engagement and is time consuming making it impractical and to the detriment of the course to seek any employment.

We would like to see some recognition and redressment of this gross injustice.
